response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value in its category. I believe it aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its high quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire a piece that is not only cost-effective but also significantly adds to its perceived value. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 12000}
